name: dds-topology-editor
description: Experimental editor for DDS topology files

scripts.devbuild: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/index.jsx --extension=.jsx -d -o dist/bundle.js
scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/index.jsx --extension=.jsx | uglifyjs > dist/bundle.js

author: Alexey Rybalchenko, Alexandar Rusinov
